comment: Great museum but unhelpful staff. We arrived at 4, knowing the museum closed at 6. We bought a ticket and looked around the main exhibition. At 5.30 we tried to go into the downstairs area of the exhibition, but were told we needed a second ticket. we wen to buy this but we‚Äôre told that ticket sales stop at 5.30 (it was exactly 5.30) Therefore with 30 minutes till closing we were not allowed to buy a ticket or to enter the exhibition without one. Bizarre.

Didn't go inside but apparently you can look at some costumes Nice square and park next to the theatre. There are benches where people can relax. The square have a lot of bikers doing tricks. Nice Lenin statue with soldiers on one side and a couple on the other side.
